# playbackStyle

**Instance Property**

An enumerated value that describes how to present an asset to the user.

## Declaration

```swift
var playbackStyle: PHAsset.PlaybackStyle { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this value to choose how your app displays the asset in [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHImageManager] regardless of the media type backing the asset.

## Displaying an Asset

- **PHAsset.PlaybackStyle**: An enumeration of asset playback styles that dictate how to present an asset to the user.
